summary: This document is a collection of administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 25, 2019. It includes a Bureau of Prisons count sheet, an inmate roster, and official count slips, primarily documenting inmate population counts and administrative procedures. The roster includes an entry for inmate 'E07-555L' with a 'SUICIDE' assignment code.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total population of 773-774 inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated July 25, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell.
An inmate roster lists an inmate with register number 'E07-555L' and an assignment code of 'SUICIDE'.
The Bureau of Prisons count sheet records a total inmate population of 773-774 at the MCC New York.
The documents are standard prison administrative forms for tracking inmate counts and assignments.
No specific individuals are named in these administrative records.
